title: Soul Dragon
description: Evelyn has grown up knowing that dragons are real, that they are walking in human shells as family and friends. Seventeen and engaged to a half-dragon, half-human, Eve discovers that everything she knew about her life is a lie. Transforming into what she’s always secretly feared is the last thing Eve needs, but there’s only one place she can go and discover just why she exists and it’s where her human heart can’t follow. Leaving the comfort of the world she knew behind, Eve is tossed into the clutches of power, love, evil and betrayal.Now she just has to make it out alive.
author: Alexei Knightsbridge
